item.title: 拉里-芬克致纽约整治犯罪、脏乱差或失去更多公司
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）说，纽约饱受犯罪和脏乱差的困扰，而且缺乏足够的好学校，他呼吁政界人士为金融公司在纽约开展业务提供更多便利。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said New York is plagued by crime and filth and lacks enough good schools, and he called on politicians to make it easier for financial firms to do business in the city.】

item.title: Binance 创始人赵明将帮助巴基斯坦推动加密货币交易竞标
item.description: 巴基斯坦已邀请全球最大的加密货币交易所 Binance 的联合创始人赵长鹏在这个南亚国家建立一个具有全球竞争力的数字金融平台。【原文：Pakistan has roped in Changpeng Zhao, the co-founder of the world’s largest crypto exchange Binance, to set up a globally competitive platform for digital finance in the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 这太疯狂了震撼股市的 15 分钟
item.description: 上午 10 点刚过，曼哈顿市中心的 Siebert 交易大厅里爆发出一阵喊叫声。公司首席投资官马克-马利克（Mark Malek）冲出办公室，听到他的首席交易员大喊，唐纳德-特朗普总统正在权衡是否要暂停连日来令股市下挫的全面关税措施。【原文：At just after 10 a.m., shouting erupted on the Siebert trading floor in downtown Manhattan. Mark Malek, the firm’s chief investment officer, rushed out of his office to hear his head trader screaming that President Donald Trump was weighing suspending the across-the-board tariff roll-out that had been sinking stock markets for days.】

item.title: 谷物期货大幅波动，交易商对关税头条做出反应
item.description: 投资者对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的一系列头条新闻作出反应，谷物大幅波动。【原文：Grains swung sharply as investors reacted to a flurry of headlines related to President Donald Trump’s trade policies.】

item.title: 瑞银顶级策略师认为 2025 年美国将面临盈利零增长的风险
item.description: 瑞银投资银行（UBS Investment Bank）首席策略师表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策有可能打击消费者需求，导致今年美国 500 强企业的盈利完全无法增长。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs threaten to hammer consumer demand, potentially resulting in absolutely no earnings growth for S&P 500 companies this year, according to UBS Investment Bank’s chief strategist.】

item.title: 全球贸易动荡可能迫使新西兰央行进一步降息
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税和全球贸易战的前景使新西兰新生的经济复苏岌岌可危，新西兰央行可能被迫进行更大幅度的降息。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank may be forced into deeper interest-rate cuts as US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs and the prospect of a global trade war put the nation’s nascent economic recovery in jeopardy.】

item.title: 石油巨头称特朗普政府最好有应对计划
item.description: 钻石能源公司（Diamondback Energy Inc.）的一位高管呼吁唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府解释全球贸易战将如何帮助页岩油生产商，这是美国石油公司老板罕见的公开反击。【原文：A top executive at Diamondback Energy Inc. called on President Donald Trump’s administration to explain how the global trade war will help shale producers, a rare instance of public pushback from a US oil boss.】

item.title: 加密风险投资活动缓慢赶上美国的友好环境
item.description: 尽管美国和全球的数字资产环境更加友好，但加密风险投资活动在很大程度上仍处于停滞状态。【原文：Despite a friendlier environment for digital assets in the US and globally, crypto venture capital activity has largely remained at a standstill.】

item.title: 美元套期保值成本飙升至特朗普当选以来最高点
item.description: 交易员们急于购买对冲美元波动的保护措施，将对冲成本推升至自去年11月唐纳德-特朗普当选以来的最高水平。【原文：Traders rushed to buy protection against dollar swings, pushing the cost of hedging to the highest level since Donald Trump’s election last November.】

item.title: 巴里克放弃黄金名称，着眼铜业未来
item.description: 它是世界第二大黄金生产商，纽约证券交易所股票代码为 "GOLD"。但如今，巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：It’s the world’s second-largest gold producer, and its New York Stock Exchange ticker is “GOLD.” But these days Barrick Gold Corp. sees its future in copper.】

item.title: 黑天鹅套期保值在全球市场动荡中飙升
item.description: 黑天鹅投资者多年来一直在等待市场崩溃，在股票牛市期间，追踪这种防御性策略的 ETF 崩溃。现在，关税引发的席卷金融资产的震荡正在刺激这种投资组合保险形式出现创纪录的反弹。【原文：Black Swan investors spent years waiting for markets to crash, with ETFs tracking the defensive strategy collapsing during the bull market in stocks. Now the tariff-induced convulsions sweeping financial assets are spurring a record rally in this form of portfolio insurance.】

item.title: 哈佛发出资金威胁警告后借款 7.5 亿美元
item.description: 哈佛大学计划向华尔街借款 7.5 亿美元，因为特朗普政府对其联邦资金的威胁越来越大。【原文：Harvard University plans to borrow $750 million from Wall Street amid mounting threats to its federal funding from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称通胀是当前更紧迫的关税问题
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策目前对通胀的影响比对经济增长的影响更为紧迫。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said President Donald Trump’s trade policy currently has more pressing implications for inflation than for economic growth.】

item.title: 即使在特朗普加征关税之前，美国也对加拿大木材征收 34% 的关税
item.description: 美国准备将对加拿大软木木材征收的关税提高一倍多，达到 34.45%，即使在唐纳德-特朗普总统对该行业征收任何新关税之前，也会对美国材料成本造成更大压力。【原文：The US is poised to more than double duties on Canadian softwood lumber to 34.45%, putting more pressure on US materials costs even before President Donald Trump places any new tariffs on the sector.】

item.title: 加拿大波利耶夫尔表示将批准 Suncor 石油项目和矿山项目
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖表示，如果当选，他将加快 10 个资源项目的审批，其中包括阿尔伯塔省 Suncor 能源公司（Suncor Energy Inc.【原文：The leader of Canada’s Conservative Party said he would accelerate approval on 10 resource projects if elected, including the extension of a major Suncor Energy Inc. oil sands mine in Alberta.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，3i 集团推迟出售猫粮生产商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 3i Group Plc 已推迟出售猫粮生产商 Applaws，因为该公司正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策对其业务的影响。【原文：Private equity firm 3i Group Plc has postponed a sale of the maker of cat food Applaws as it assesses the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on the business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 兰博基尼成立特别工作组，首席执行官参与关税应对工作
item.description: 兰博基尼成立了一个特别工作组来评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施，并每天召开有首席执行官参加的会议，以考虑超级跑车制造商的应对措施。【原文：Lamborghini has set up a task force to assess US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, with daily meetings involving its chief executive officer to consider the supercar maker’s response.】

item.title: 德国商业银行称部分 IPO 候选者已放弃计划
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布加征关税引发全球市场大跌后，一些希望上市的公司已经停止了这些计划。【原文：Commerzbank AG said some companies looking to go public have halted those plans after Donald Trump’s tariff announcement fueled a global market selloff.】

item.title: 法国称欧盟已准备好在美国贸易谈判中使用所有工具
item.description: 法国贸易部长洛朗-圣马丁（Laurent Saint-Martin）表示，欧盟国家一致认为，在与美国就唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税问题进行谈判时，可以使用所有可用的工具作为威胁。【原文：European Union countries agree all available tools may be used as threats in talks with the US on President Donald Trump’s tariffs, according to French Trade Minister Laurent Saint-Martin.】

item.title: 英伟达与木薯非洲人工智能工厂合作，耗资 7.2 亿美元
item.description: 木薯科技公司（Cassava Technologies）可能会向非洲首家人工智能工厂投资多达 7.2 亿美元，该工厂将由英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Cassava Technologies may invest as much as $720 million in Africa’s first artificial intelligence factory that will be built by Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税动荡引发非洲国家债券市场封锁的隐忧
item.description: 由于关税动荡导致投资者抛售风险较高的资产，非洲各国政府正面临再次被全球债券市场拒之门外的前景。【原文：African governments are facing the prospect of being shut out of global bond markets again, as tariff turbulence leads investors to dump riskier assets.】

item.title: 加拿大银行称贸易战点燃通胀预期
item.description: 加拿大银行的调查显示，企业认为与美国的贸易冲突所带来的价格上涨压力将超过需求疲软所带来的价格下降压力，这有可能使保持通胀预期稳固的努力前功尽弃。【原文：Bank of Canada surveys show firms believe upward price pressures from the trade conflict with the US will exceed the downward pull from weaker demand, threatening to undo progress on keeping inflation expectations well-anchored.】

item.title: 特朗普指示安全小组审查美国钢铁贸易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令对美国钢铁公司可能出售给新日本钢铁公司的交易进行审查，为修改其前任乔-拜登阻止该交易的决定打开了大门。【原文：President Donald Trump ordered a review of the potential sale of United States Steel Corp. to Nippon Steel Corp., opening the door to amend a decision by his predecessor, Joe Biden, to block the transaction.】

item.title: 美国关税打击了不可能的目标：用于 Covid 研究的猴子
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的新关税可能会使美国制药公司用于试验的长尾猕猴的进口价格上涨 40%。【原文：President Donald Trump’s new tariffs will likely make imports of long-tailed macaques that US pharmaceutical companies use for trials 40% more expensive.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发全球贸易震荡，欧盟贸易首脑们意见趋同
item.description: 针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的全面关税措施，欧盟各国贸易部长团结一致，表示准备采取全方位的反制措施，包括可能对数字公司征税。【原文：European Union trade ministers closed ranks and signaled readiness to deploy a full spectrum of countermeasures including potential taxes on digital companies in response to US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，英国对汽车制造商说 "我们支持你们
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）向英国汽车制造商表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上周征收关税使英国汽车业陷入混乱之后，政府将为他们提供支持。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves told UK automakers that the government will support them after US President Donald Trump’s tariffs last week sent the industry into turmoil.】

item.title: VIX 指数再次飙升，合约预示波动率将居高不下
item.description: Cboe 波动率指数在隔夜飙升至 60 以上后走高，期货曲线显示波动率可能在数月内保持高位。【原文：The Cboe Volatility Index is higher following an overnight spike above 60, and the futures curve is signaling that volatility may remain elevated for months.】

item.title: 银行推迟出售 HIG 美加 IT 合并贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以蒙特利尔银行为首的一批银行已经推迟了一项11亿美元的贷款出售计划，该计划将为HIG Capital LLC收购加拿大公司Converge Technology Solutions Corp.提供资金。【原文：A group of banks led by Bank of Montreal have postponed a $1.1 billion loan sale that was to help finance HIG Capital LLC’s planned purchase of Canadian firm Converge Technology Solutions Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华沙交易所因波动和高交易量暂停交易
item.description: 华沙证券交易所周一以 "安全原因 "为由，在波动性和交易量激增的情况下，暂停其所有市场的交易一个多小时。【原文：The Warsaw Stock Exchange is suspending trade on all its markets for more than an hour on Monday, citing “safety reasons” amid a spike in volatility and volumes.】
